TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_kung-cu_atu_balaut, title = kung-cu_atu_balaut, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/kung-cu_atu_balaut} }

S.FORM: kung-cu atu balaut kungku nu kamu caysiw-caytu a mihcaan nu Niw-aw-lan , wawa henay ci Ti-an-na idaw ku nipisimsiman nida atu wama mangalay misiwbay tu kakanen, nika siidaay nida a cabayan ci Ayle-e mihalhal tu aidaw ku mahicaay kiya nu kasasungalayan a kawawan. dimiadan tu, nikapatayan nu wama ni Tian-na mahida tu ku kawaw nida misuped tu kalisiw micakay tu lala', a idaw ku nidatengan tu nu udip a sasiwbayan. tawya, Mae-duo-niya (馬爾多尼亞 Maldonia) a Lay-wun wan-ce tayni i tini mikilin tu sasaacawaan, pabeli han ni Tian-na ci Ayle-e tu sasaasuay nu kakanen, kya yadah ku cipu ni Tian-na anu masuped tu ku cipu, kya idaw ku sapicakay tu nikaiya nutaw a luma'an. manamuh tu dadadiwan kiya Lay-wun wan-ce , sademiada sa midang nai' ku balucu misakakawaw, mapatucek nu itdaay a la'cusay nu mapalaway, pacebaan nu mapalaway tayda pesan nu mapalway malabalaut. yu mahida ni sawacuan ni Lay-wun wan-ce a tubang nida cinida tu ku waywayan, idaw ku sibalucuay a sapialaway tu zaysang a tademawan ci Huo puo-se atu ci Law-lun-se . pilitemuhan tu lalukiyawan a kawawan, idaw ku musakamuay ci Tian-na an anu caay kisu kayaydatu paaca, asipacakay kisu han. mangusebit a dihen ku bihid niTian-na suayaw sa cinida tu tapuku, i salining malitemuh nida ku malabalutay a tademaw ci Lay-wun, yukiwan nida kisuen kaku sa kya malatademaw kaku, alaw caykalaheci malabalut namin ku nuheni tatusa. mabiyalaw tu ku nuhini tatusa, milawlaw tu i kalimulakan ku nuheni tatusa, sadikuday masiket nu besu mubahel taydan i lanulanuan, kilalebu hantu nu e'yi. sakatusa a demiad, culal sa ku manamuhay tu dadadiwan a E'yi ci Alu, sakamusa idaw ku matinengay a mapalaway ci Laipuo misumad pataluman malatademawan sa, ci Alu mangalay malatademaw mapulung midatuk, lakal satu tayda mikilim ci Laipuoan. muculil henay, bateluan nu balaut a miadupay, tumian misaiculang ku nuheni mahulak. caay kaw matinengay tina kawawan ci Ayle ku mangalay miyukiw tu sapikikun tu ci misengiay a Laywenan, kumamasumad tu ya pacebaay a Lawen mangalay tu idang nu tatengaay a Laywenan kay taneng paceba sa, ci Huo-puose idaw ku sapatahekal nida tu adingu a hitayan ku midakep tu nuhenian. mungangaw ku dadan nuheni taydan i lanulanuan, tumian idaw ku adipawpawnay mipadan patakilal tu dadan, taydan i luma' ni Laipuo. nina kawawan, masamataan a tademawan ci Tian-nan maliyuh misinsin tu canan a sakaudipan, hina mapaciemay a tatusa ci Tian-nan atu Laywen alaw han haymawsa a kapah kuhini, nusiidaay a wawaan ci Laywen malingatu tu matineng misakakawaw tu kakanen, masasupadang ku nuheni tatusa tu caaya kadem nu kawawan nuheni alaw masasumidang ku nuheni. debung nu adingu a hitayan, suayawan ni Laipuo a miala ku nuheni, saan ci Laypuo anu matepa' ku nabalucuan kya mahulak ku nitimaan. pabaliw ku nuheni anu makakisu tatusa a malatamedaw tu sa, ubiyan nuheni mikacaw ku balunga aytaban nu labii katukuh i luma' sa. manamuh ci Laywen ci Tian-nan an, ku miyukiw tu sapikikun cinidaan, nika ci Tian-na misimsim tu sasakawawan nida tu kakanen, ci Lawen paayaw tu nabalucuan ni Tian-nan, pabalucu' sa tu ci Ayle-e a mikimung, idaw tu ku kalisiw sapabeli ci Tian-nan an misiwbay tu kakanen. liyas sa hen ci Laywen, caay pihaymaw madakep ni Huopuo-se, ci Aylee atu pacebaay a Lawen ku mikikung tu. ci Tian-nan palutatenga mapataluma' tu ci pacebaan a Laywenan, ci Acun tada mangabil tu tela' sa kukamu katinengan ni Lawen ku nabalucuan. Acun, Alu atu Tian-nan matatules ku lima nuheni mialaw tu nitimaan a uduan, sadikuday malawpesm, ci Huo-puose cuduhen patayda i duutduutan, ya pacebaay a Lawen nan malatademaw tu ci Lawlunse dakepen. ci Aylee maadih nida ci Tian-nan atu ci Laywen tuni kasasungaayan, mangalay mihulak mitima' tu sakaykisuan , taban nu labiyi masuni ku tuki mahida henay ku nuheni tatusa u balaut henay. ci Acun maemek nu mapalaway mapatay, tanunamuh satu atu mamidang dida ci Yiwen-cialin, mala tapukuan nu cacaya a bunacan. sadikuday, nipida'su an ni Laypuo, ina tatusaay a balaut itida i lanulanuan pada'suan nu katuuday mikikung ku nuheni. u wawa nu siidaay ci Laywen, siacawa ci Tian-nanan mala tatengaay tu nu kuncu, kisu hantu ni Laywen ci Tian-nan, tluma' satu malatademaw. ci Tian-nan malaheci tu nida ku sapikawaw tu kakanen , atu ci Laywen hida satu ku nikakapah a maudip, malawanhui tu. mahedek tu kina kakungkuan.

kong-co ato balaot kongko no kamo caysiw-cayto a mihcaan no Niw-aw-lan , wawa henay ci Ti-an-na idaw ko nipisimsiman nida ato wama mangalay misiwbay to kakanen, nika siidaay nida a cabayan ci Ayle-e mihalhal to aidaw ko mahicaay kiya no kasasongalayan a kawawan. dimiadan to, nikapatayan no wama ni Tian-na mahida to ko kawaw nida misoped to kalisiw micakay to lala', a idaw ko nidatengan to no odip a sasiwbayan. tawya, Mae-doo-niya (馬爾多尼亞 Maldonia) a Lay-won wan-ce tayni i tini mikilin to sasaacawaan, pabeli han ni Tian-na ci Ayle-e to sasaasoay no kakanen, kya yadah ko cipo ni Tian-na ano masoped to ko cipo, kya idaw ko sapicakay to nikaiya notaw a loma'an. manamoh to dadadiwan kiya Lay-won wan-ce , sademiada sa midang nai' ko baloco misakakawaw, mapatocek no itdaay a la'cosay no mapalaway, pacebaan no mapalaway tayda pesan no mapalway malabalaot. yo mahida ni sawacoan ni Lay-won wan-ce a tobang nida cinida to ko waywayan, idaw ko sibalocoay a sapialaway to zaysang a tademawan ci Hoo poo-se ato ci Law-lon-se . pilitemohan to lalokiyawan a kawawan, idaw ko mosakamoay ci Tian-na an ano caay kiso kayaydato paaca, asipacakay kiso han. mangosebit a dihen ko bihid niTian-na soayaw sa cinida to tapoko, i salining malitemoh nida ko malabalotay a tademaw ci Lay-won, yokiwan nida kisoen kako sa kya malatademaw kako, alaw caykalaheci malabalot namin ko noheni tatosa. mabiyalaw to ko nohini tatosa, milawlaw to i kalimolakan ko noheni tatosa, sadikoday masiket no beso mobahel taydan i lanolanoan, kilalebo hanto no e'yi. sakatosa a demiad, colal sa ko manamohay to dadadiwan a E'yi ci Alo, sakamosa idaw ko matinengay a mapalaway ci Laipoo misomad pataloman malatademawan sa, ci Alo mangalay malatademaw mapolong midatok, lakal sato tayda mikilim ci Laipooan. mocolil henay, bateloan no balaot a miadopay, tomian misaicolang ko noheni maholak. caay kaw matinengay tina kawawan ci Ayle ko mangalay miyokiw to sapikikon to ci misengiay a Laywenan, komamasomad to ya pacebaay a Lawen mangalay to idang no tatengaay a Laywenan kay taneng paceba sa, ci Hoo-poose idaw ko sapatahekal nida to adingo a hitayan ko midakep to nohenian. mongangaw ko dadan noheni taydan i lanolanoan, tomian idaw ko adipawpawnay mipadan patakilal to dadan, taydan i loma' ni Laipoo. nina kawawan, masamataan a tademawan ci Tian-nan maliyoh misinsin to canan a sakaodipan, hina mapaciemay a tatosa ci Tian-nan ato Laywen alaw han haymawsa a kapah kohini, nosiidaay a wawaan ci Laywen malingato to matineng misakakawaw to kakanen, masasopadang ko noheni tatosa to caaya kadem no kawawan noheni alaw masasomidang ko noheni. debong no adingo a hitayan, soayawan ni Laipoo a miala ko noheni, saan ci Laypoo ano matepa' ko nabalocoan kya maholak ko nitimaan. pabaliw ko noheni ano makakiso tatosa a malatamedaw to sa, obiyan noheni mikacaw ko balonga aytaban no labii katokoh i loma' sa. manamoh ci Laywen ci Tian-nan an, ko miyokiw to sapikikon cinidaan, nika ci Tian-na misimsim to sasakawawan nida to kakanen, ci Lawen paayaw to nabalocoan ni Tian-nan, pabaloco' sa to ci Ayle-e a mikimong, idaw to ko kalisiw sapabeli ci Tian-nan an misiwbay to kakanen. liyas sa hen ci Laywen, caay pihaymaw madakep ni Hoopoo-se, ci Aylee ato pacebaay a Lawen ko mikikong to. ci Tian-nan palotatenga mapataloma' to ci pacebaan a Laywenan, ci Acon tada mangabil to tela' sa kokamo katinengan ni Lawen ko nabalocoan. Acon, Alo ato Tian-nan matatoles ko lima noheni mialaw to nitimaan a odoan, sadikoday malawpesm, ci Hoo-poose codohen patayda i dootdootan, ya pacebaay a Lawen nan malatademaw to ci Lawlonse dakepen. ci Aylee maadih nida ci Tian-nan ato ci Laywen toni kasasongaayan, mangalay miholak mitima' to sakaykisoan , taban no labiyi masoni ko toki mahida henay ko noheni tatosa o balaot henay. ci Acon maemek no mapalaway mapatay, tanonamoh sato ato mamidang dida ci Yiwen-cialin, mala tapokoan no cacaya a bonacan. sadikoday, nipida'so an ni Laypoo, ina tatosaay a balaot itida i lanolanoan pada'soan no katooday mikikong ko noheni. o wawa no siidaay ci Laywen, siacawa ci Tian-nanan mala tatengaay to no konco, kiso hanto ni Laywen ci Tian-nan, tloma' sato malatademaw. ci Tian-nan malaheci to nida ko sapikawaw to kakanen , ato ci Laywen hida sato ko nikakapah a maodip, malawanhoi to. mahedek to kina kakongkoan.
